sense.def:
Kadar je nekdo ali nekaj
afloat
ostane delno nad vodno gladino in se ne potopi.

seg.quote: By kicking constantly he could stay afloat.

sense.def:
To stay afloat
ali
to keep a business afloat
pomeni imeti ravno še dovolj denarja za poslovanje.

seg.quote: They have kept Vickers afloat during the recession.
